name: Not Rad!
description:
Not Rad Dude! Play as the Skater Boy who has to run away from the Nuclear Power plant. Shred through four different levels trying to avoid the barrels of nuclear sludge. Get Tubular Bra!

Controls:

Move = The right arrow key

Space = Jump 

Notes:

1. The game was going to have a health system, but was not implemented at this time

2. The game ends abruptly at the fourth screen, no game over screen was able to be made in time.

3. This is just a prototype, so the game has a long way to go. But it is functional.

Have fun! And thank you for playing my game!
